B1.question: Are you familiar with the concept of Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)?

B2.question: Which of the following SBOM formats are you familiar with? Select all that apply.

B3.question: Are you aware of any existing SBOM standards / specifications for ML/DL systems (AIBOMs)?

AI1.question: Indicate your agreement with the following statement: "Current SBOM formats adequately support machine/deep learning (ML/DL) systems."

AI2.question: What data fields should be included in SBOMs to adequately describe a machine/deep learning (ML/DL) system? Select all that apply.

AI3.question: Can SBOMs of ML/DL systems (AIBOMs) follow the same current SBOM specifications and standards?

AI4.question: Please describe a potential new solution for specifying SBOMs of ML/DL systems (AIBOMS).

AI5.question: Are you aware of any tools which currently facilitate the automatic generation of AIBOMs?

AI6.question: How would you prefer AIBOMs be distributed? Rank by preference (by dragging the options).
options: Located in repositories along with source code or model
Available from the project developers upon request

AI7.question: How can we ensure that AIBOMs completely and correctly report all the dependencies of ML/DL systems?

D1.question: Indicate your agreement with the following statement: "Datasets for ML/DL systems should come with a bill of materials (DataBOM)."

D2.question: Are you aware of any existing standards for DataBOMs?

D3.question: What data fields should be included in a DataBOM to adequately describe a dataset for a ML/DL system? Select all that apply.

D4.question: Are you aware of any tools that generate DataBOMs?

D5.question: What do you think the relationship between AIBOMs and DataBOMs should be?

D6.question: How should DataBOMs be shared / distributed? Rank by preference (by dragging the options).
options: Stored with a trusted third party
Downloadable from maintainer or owner website

D7.question: What are some of the benefits you expect to see from using DataBOMs, if any?

D8.question: What main challenges do you foresee in the creation and use of DataBOMs?

D9.question: How can we ensure that DataBOMs completely and correctly report all the dependencies and/or components of datasets used by ML/DL systems?

C1.question: What are some of the benefits you expect to see from using AIBOMs, if any?

C2.question: What main challenges do you foresee in the creation and use of AIBOMs?

C3.question: Do vulnerability databases (such as CVE) exist for ML/DL systems?

C4.question: Indicate your agreement with the following statement: "Vulnerability databases for ML/DL systems meet the security needs of developers and consumers"

C5.question: Do vulnerability databases (such as CVE) exist for datasets of ML/DL systems?

C6.question: Indicate your agreement with the following statement: "Vulnerability databases for datasets of ML/DL systems meet the security needs of developers and consumers"

C7.question: Given recent concerns regarding scraped public material being included in machine/deep learning datasets, how should AIBOMs address licensed material, if at all?

Q1.question: How many years of experience developing machine/deep learning systems do you have?

Q2.question: How would you describe your primary role?

Q3.question: What is your highest level of education?

Q4.question: Which programming languages have you most used in past projects? Select all that apply.

Q5.question: Which machine / deep learning models do you use most frequently?

Q6.question: Do you primarily work on open source or closed source projects?

Q7.question: For which domains (e.g., banking or healthcare) have you developed applications / systems?

Q8.question: Do you have a background in computer security? Formal (college classes, degree, certification) or informal (self-learning or other training)?

Q9.question: Do you have a background in software licensing? Formal (college classes, degree, certification) or informal (self-learning or other training)?

Q10.question: How often did you release or help release a new major version of an application / software over the past two years? Please give your best estimate; if you develop more than one software / application, please answer based on the most frequently updated software / application.

Q11.question: Which country / countries are you and / or your organization based in?

Q12.question: Please enter your email address. This will be used to contact you for compensation. If we are interested in your responses, we may contact you for a follow-up interview, if you are willing.
